name: Select Flaw
description: Select a flaw to see its description

name: Asthma
description: If your character moves more than 5 spaces in a turn, you must pass a Constitution check or else take 1d10 damage.

name: Battle-scarred
description: If you roll an initiative of 8 or lower, your first action will be a Stress Response.

name: Catastrophic Failure
description: Whenever you roll and 1/2 or more of the rolls are critical fails, there is a chance the outcome becomes a catastrophic failure, leading to a butterfly effect chain that ends in a disaster. This can occur no more than once a play session.

name: Clumsy
description: Your character occasionally slips. Your character must pass a Dexterity or Athletics active roll or else causes an accident.

name: Glutton
description: Your character only restores 2 energy per unit of food.

name: Hemophiliac
description: Health regain effects are reduced by 50%.

name: Nearsighted
description: If your character takes damage, roll a D20. If the roll is 10 or under, your character's glasses break, giving you a -5 penalty to ranged attacks and Perception.

name: Restless
description: Your character does not get a Long Rest bonus for resource restoration.

name: Sickly
description: Your character has a rare, incurable disease. Your character now has a daily consumption requirement of 1 special medicine. If starting the game with this flaw, start with 3 special medicine.

name: Unlucky
description: Two times a play session, the ZM can force you to re-roll any roll. Any resources spent on the initial roll are refunded.
